Luna:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Luna:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Luna:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Luna:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Luna:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Luna:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Luna:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Luna:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Luna:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Luna:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Luna:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Luna:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Luna:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
